title: Ukraine Fired U.S.-Made Missiles Into Russia for First Time, Officials Say
content: The attack came just days after President Biden gave Ukraine permission to use the weapons to strike targets inside Russia.

title: U.S. Envoy Visits Lebanon, Seeking Truce Between Israel and Hezbollah
content: The envoy, Amos Hochstein, said an end to the fighting was “within our grasp” after meeting in Beirut with Lebanon’s Parliament speaker, a key interlocutor with Hezbollah.

title: Putin Lowers Nuclear Weapons Threshold After U.S. Allows Ukraine to Use Missiles Against Russia
content: A decree signed by the Russian leader, though long planned, came days after President Biden authorized the use of U.S.-supplied  missiles by Ukraine for strikes inside Russia.
summary: A decree signed by the Russian leader, though long planned, came days after President Biden authorized the use of U.S.-supplied  missiles by Ukraine for strikes inside Russia.

title: Brazilian Police Arrest Soldiers in Alleged Plot to Kill President Lula
content: Members of an elite army unit planned to kill Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva in 2022 as part of an effort to keep Jair Bolsonaro in power after he lost the presidential election.
summary: Members of an elite army unit planned to kill Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva in 2022 as part of an effort to keep Jair Bolsonaro in power after he lost the presidential election.

title: Sweden, Finland and Norway Update Crisis Advice as Ukraine-Russia War Grinds On

title: Delhi Trudges Through Another Air Pollution Nightmare

title: Out of Gaza
content: We photographed badly wounded Gazans who made it out for treatment. Many can think of little but the dead they left behind. “We wanted to go with them, too,” one child told us.
summary: We photographed badly wounded Gazans who made it out for treatment. Many can think of little but the dead they left behind. “We wanted to go with them, too,” one child told us.

title: Dozens of Hong Kong Pro-Democracy Leaders Sentenced in Mass Trial

title: Magicians Mount Search for Woman Behind Decades-Old Deception
content: A British society of magicians expelled a woman for tricking her way into the club in 1991. Now it wants to invite her back, but the woman seems to have pulled a disappearing act.

title: U.K. Farmers Protest in London Over Inheritance Tax Change

title: Netanyahu Offers $5 Million for Each Hostage Freed in Gaza

title: Biden Fades Out of the Picture in Talks With World Leaders

title: The Perfect Novel for the Baku Climate Summit: Lydia Kiesling’s Mobility
